Social Science Education (7-12).1: Make content knowledge accessible to students.
Social Science Education (7-12).2: Create, implement and assess instructional and curricular goals.
Social Science Education (7-12).3: Create and maintain a respectful and productive classroom learning environment.
Social Science Education (7-12).5: Deliver instruction that is considerate of student development, diversity, and special needs.
Social Science Education (7-12).6: Apply theory and research in social sciences education to classroom practices.
Social Science Education (7-12).7: Teach effectively each of the seven social science fields including in an interdisciplinary manner.
